body:
Now this is some nice data, but its also lacking. Because sure, these are many faces, but what are the exact percentages, and how would we measure them, 13/50 is an example of data all parties are willing to verify because its such a straight forward and verifiable claim.. this is less so with the information presented in your post.
What percentage of MSM is owned by jews. What percentage of news interpreters are jews. What percentage in the whole industry are jews etc.. of the movie and entertainment industry.. etc.. There are various ways to quantify this. (perhaps the argument of diversity could even be used to fight it)

body:
And even if they own most of it, it does not mean any misconduct. People think of "da jooz" as a single block but various sects and backgrounds exist like Ashkenazi, Mezhraki, Hasidi, Secular etc. Some of them hate each other more than other religions. 20% of Israeli Jews oppose Israel due to religious reasons.

This is why their propaganda is wrong. It oversimplifies da joos. If you say these people work together because theu're rich, I believe it. Class interests. But claiming these people work together because they have the same identity is absurd.

post.title: Is the media owned by Jews?

body:
I think the vast over-representation speaks for itself. According to Gallup and Pew Research Center findings, ["at maximum 2.2% of the U.S. adult population has some basis for Jewish self-identification."](https://news.gallup.com/opinion/polling-matters/265898/american-jews-politics-israel.aspx). The amount of power and control they have despite making up such a small percentage of the population is staggering, and that's limited to those who are openly jewish.

That's only the media. There are so many [foreign NGOs, foundations, and political organizations](https://files.catbox.moe/mmj4id.png) they control. Then there's academia, banking/finance, pornography, pro immigration groups (although not for Israel)...

>What percentage of MSM is owned by jews. What percentage of news interpreters are jews. What percentage in the whole industry are jews etc.. 

It's hard to say the exact figures, but I would bet both of my testicles that it's a LOT more than 2.2%. It would be hard to find a single news publication, TV station, or movie studio that doesn't have a jew or several jews running it.
body_html:
I think the vast over-representation speaks for itself. According to Gallup and Pew Research Center findings, "at maximum 2.2% of the U.S. adult population has some basis for Jewish self-identification.". The amount of power and control they have despite making up such a small percentage of the population is staggering, and that's limited to those who are openly jewish.

That's only the media. There are so many foreign NGOs, foundations, and political organizations they control. Then there's academia, banking/finance, pornography, pro immigration groups (although not for Israel)...

What percentage of MSM is owned by jews. What percentage of news interpreters are jews. What percentage in the whole industry are jews etc..

It's hard to say the exact figures, but I would bet both of my testicles that it's a LOT more than 2.2%. It would be hard to find a single news publication, TV station, or movie studio that doesn't have a jew or several jews running it.

post.title: Is the media owned by Jews?

body:
That's just it, there's a ton of information and history to go through. It's easy to take black crime rates and whittle them down into a few manageable meme statistics that will stick with everyone regardless of which side of the argument they're on. The notion that blacks are unpredictable and violent is easily observable and doesn't require much effort to understand, whereas the jewish issue is too multifaceted and too complex to be treated that way. We don't have blacks in the upper echelons of society working to stifle any information that paints a negative picture of them.

"Information overload" is one of the sole purposes of this guild. Why would anyone want to be here if they weren't already receptive and willing to investigate the material? I don't think any of the regular subscribers here are interested in milquetoast, sugar-coated, chewable redpills. Maybe there should be another guild for that, like +JewishInquisition or +JewCurious.

post.title: Is the media owned by Jews?

body:
I kinda disagree. Sure, establishing the level of over representation in society is a much broader question than comparing instances of violence between white and black people, however, this comparison is also merely one part of a much bigger question. The jewish question can also be broken down into much easier to understand and verifiable data. Like this image for example, which i still consider to be too complex, but it picks one topic and demonstrates the over representation in an objective and neutral manner. https://files.catbox.moe/w1zd70.jpg With media something like this should be easy as well, depending on the question. "What percentage of MSM is jewish owned" would be an example of a question with an easy, quantifiable and verifiable answer. (if I find some time and motivation i might turn this into a graph myself one of these days). "What percentage of TV personalities are jewish" .. a bit tougher question but still manageable, and the further it goes the more difficult and massive it becomes. 

"information overload" is something you would want to prevent if you want to convince others about this being a problem. Another problem is that this is a topic with a lot of untruths from both sides.. a lot of faces in an image sure makes an impression, but there is no way of telling if this is misleading or not without tracking down every single person and their religious convictions working in those companies and then comparing their influences to jewish ones.. its just an incredibly large task to verify something like this.
body_html:

"What percentage of MSM is jewish owned" would be an example of a question with an easy, quantifiable and verifiable answer. (if I find some time and motivation i might turn this into a graph myself one of these days). "What percentage of TV personalities are jewish" .. a bit tougher question but still manageable, and the further it goes the more difficult and massive it becomes.

"information overload" is something you would want to prevent if you want to convince others about this being a problem. body: I don't even believe the rich ones work together any more than rich of every race do. I think this is all just their nature. It's like the 13/50 concept. No one reasonable thinks that blacks are working together to commit the most crime. It's just their nature. Jewish people's nature is what leads them to positions where they can manipulate the stupid masses. They want as many lower IQ people as possible, hence them promoting immigration from non-white/Asian people. They use this power to promote their core ideologies that most of them believe in. Which is what leads to the promotion of communism and totalitarianism.

parent.body:
And even if they own most of it, it does not mean any misconduct. People think of "da jooz" as a single block but various sects and backgrounds exist like Ashkenazi, Mezhraki, Hasidi, Secular etc. Some of them hate each other more than other religions. 20% of Israeli Jews oppose Israel due to religious reasons.

This is why their propaganda is wrong. It oversimplifies da joos. If you say these people work together because theu're rich, I believe it. Class interests. But claiming these people work together because they have the same identity is absurd.

body:
Manipulation of stupid people and keeping them stupid is the basis of capitalism. Those with the capital (like factories, brands, companies) can demoralise people beyond recognition. This is not a Jewry issue, this is a class interest issue. Many rich jews / non jews collaborate to end workers rights, because class interests can reach where ethnical lines can't.

In no communist society they could've had this power. All your examples are based on US, which is the prime example of an "free market" façade of cronyism. Capitalism thrives under the illusion of choice.

body:
I don't disagree at all with your perspective on capitalism. It's just another tool that Jews use. They can still promote communism, while taking the form of capitalists, because they become one and the same when enough government is involved. Totalitarianism is the primary method. Whether or not the government gets the capital from production, then gives a part to the producer or if the producer keeps the capital, then gives a part to the government, makes no difference to the rulers. 

A true free market, under libertarian ideology, would eradicate the ruling class. Which is why they can't allow it to happen.

body:
> whites improve the conditions of the areas we control

It depends. I can think of plenty of examples of both improvements and destruction. How about Stalin, Hitler, Andrew Jackson, FDR, Donald Trump, Hillary Clinton, Mike Pence, Antifa and BLM, most serial killers, hell most of the government?

> jews exist only to trick, exploit, destroy, and leech off their host nations.

You're making too many assumptions based on ethnicity. Even though you see a pattern, even if there *were* a pattern, it's unfair to judge every individual person based entirely on that. Even if we assume that jews and blacks are generally not as good of people as europeans (which I don't believe), it's undeniable that there are still plenty of both jews and blacks who are just as good as famous whites. Guilt by association is a major fallacy and can have serious consequences.

> they aren't capable of creating good music, art, societies, useful inventions, or culture in general

As defined by who? If you like a certain culture that's great, but that doesn't make it objectively better for everyone.

body:
There are extremist sects in every religion:

* Islam: Do I even need to explain ISIS and such?
* Atheism: Communist SJW revolutionaries, things like Antifa and BLM that want to organize a totalitarian regime and kill those who disagree (like North Korea)
* Paganism: Italian Fascism, Nazi Germany, and 90% of ancient nations prior to the Middle Ages which were only interested in power and constantly fought each other for absolute rule. They tortured and killed anyone who dared to dissent. They also watched real people be savagely killed, tortured, and abused for show and entertainment.
* Medieval/Renaissance Catholicism: See Paganism
* Renaissance-Period "Christianity": Endless witch hunts, torture, burnings, savage festivals and parades, etc.

What makes you think this is specific to Judaism? It's all human nature.
